entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
